name: easy-novnc
description: An easy way to run a noVNC instance and proxy with a single binary.

NOVNC_CIDR_WHITELIST.description: CIDR whitelist for when arbitrary hosts are enabled (comma separated) (conflicts with blacklist)

NOVNC_CIDR_BLACKLIST.description: CIDR blacklist for when arbitrary hosts are enabled (comma separated) (conflicts with blacklist)

NOVNC_BASIC_UI.description: Hide connection options from the main screen

NOVNC_HOST.description: The host/ip to connect to by default

NOVNC_PORT.description: The port to connect to by default

NOVNC_NO_URL_PASSWORD.description: Do not allow password in URL params

NOVNC_PARAMS.description: Extra URL params for noVNC (advanced) (comma separated key-value pairs) (e.g. resize=remote)
